tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My aunt has been suffering from knee pain due to degeneration in knees (synovial fluid almost nil) and also she was suffering from edema in legs. So ,I took her to Ranganath sir. The way he receives the patient is so warming. He is very professional and curing the patient is his ultimate goal. Also he explains the medication and exercise clearly to the patient and the escort. Spends quality time with patient to know their condition better. Best thing is , without proper diagnosis he wouldn't prescribe anything . "Vaidyo Narayano Harihi" aptly suits him.I wish there are more doctors like him offering great service to humanity.I sincerely thank him from the bottom of my heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited doctor for my mother's hip fracture. She is 65 years old. Doctor explained us about the surgery very well with pictures and he took good care of my mother during and after the surgery guiding us with the physiotherapy also. She is recovering very fast. He did surgery so well that after the surgery she doesn't have even a little bit of pain or discomfort. We visited doctor twice after the surgery and we never waited for doctor more than 10 mins. We are very happy and satisfied with his treatment and we are thankful to doctor. I recommend that everyone with ortho issues must visit Dr. Ranganath reddy for best treatment and believe me you won't regret.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had the pleasure of getting consulted by Dr. Ranganath Reddy . He treated me with utmost patience and always made me feel at ease. He never ever suggested any unnecessary medications and always tried to prescribe only what was absolutely necessary. My first experience with him was so wonderful that I had my parents also get consulted by him . They were also very pleased with his kind nature and patience . Now, he has become my go to doctor for any orthopaedic related issues. 

I would like to recommend Dr. Ranganath Reddy to everyone who are looking for good orthopaedic surgeons in Hyderabad.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Ranganath sir is very patient in listenting to the patient health issue and also gives right analysis and explanation for the cause.so i went for my hand index finger fracture he suggested the right physio to recover it where as other doctors who i consulted earlier suggested for surgery even the same with my sciatica pain. Now i am all active Thank you sir for the treatmentüôÇ. You can always see the doctor greeting you with smile and cool face which gives the patient assurity that all will be well. Thank you sir once again.  Hope and wish you treat many more patients üôÇ

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Ranganath Reddy was very clear about the treatment. It really made my mother in law feel comfortable and secure. He was very patient and clarified all her doubts about all the symptoms she had. I feel that is the most important  thing  which makes the patient feel that he or she is in safe hands. After the surgery also the follow ups also were also were equally good. 
         I liked the way he  explained about the whole proceedure. I felt he was a kind of approachable person especially for people like us who r from r√∫ral areas.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had an ACL reconstruction and meniscus repair surgery. The surgery was extremely smooth and the most appealing factor was the wonderful post-op pain management. I seem to have good improvement in my knee and I am very happy with the treatment. I hope to regain full knee function very soon. 

To talk about Dr. Ranganath Reddy, he is very friendly, patiently answers every question you have, personally tends to your care, constantly checks on your well-being and lastly, is a wonderful experienced surgeon. I'd recommend him any day!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My mother has been suffering from severe knee pains for years but she was never ready to get a surgery because of her fears. Finally we visited doctor Ranganath Reddy, orthopaedic surgeon. He is truly a gem to be treasured there. He is extremely professional, efficient and personable in coordinating the numerous facets needed for a smooth experience. In addition to what a patient may expect as routine in scheduling surgery, he on numerous occasions went above and beyond by placing that extra call to assure we had taken care of things  which were required to do. He not only made my mother feel confident  but also took care that there would be no issues for surgery..he also made her feel like he personally cared about this being as painless as possible for my mom. Today is the third day post surgery.  She got discharged yesterday. She's doing very well.. all credits to the doctor. We will always be thankful and grateful to  you sir!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ranganath Reddy did surgery on my right leg Achilles Tendon. My experience was very good and I felt that all the staff was very interested in My comfort. Doctor has genuine care and concern for his patients. Not only did he check on me during my stay in the hospital, but he also called me personally once I was released- to make sure I was ok and to see if I had any questions. I'm so fortunate to have found such an excellent surgeon. I would recommend Sunshine hospital and Dr. Ranganath Reddy to anyone who needs this procedure.
